welcome.head_text: Free application for teamwork on projects

feature1.title: Work smarter
feature1.description: Tasks are no longer lost - everything is recorded and marked, important files are attached

feature2.title: Use free
feature2.description: The app is available absolutely free. Without SMS, after registration

feature3.title: Save time
feature3.description: The application uses a kanban approach to the distribution of tasks, which significantly saves time

about_course.title: About course
about_course.desc1: The application was developed as part of the 3rd stage (React 2022Q1) of training on a free course
about_course.desc2: Free course from The Rolling Scopes community for those who want to gain knowledge and experience, sufficient for employment in the position of Junior Software Engineer in the field

Roman.name: Roman
Roman.work: Wireframe and application design. Welcome page, content for it. Redux Toolkit implementation. Editing page layout, boards

Artem.name: Artem
Artem.work: Authorization and registration. Create, modify and delete tasks and columns. Localization. Editing user data

Dmitriy.name: Dmitriy
Dmitriy.work: Backend deployment. Drag & drop for columns, tasks, implementation of board functionality
